Smart Toothbrush with AI Technology: Create a toothbrush with built-in artificial intelligence that can detect when you're not brushing correctly and provide real-time feedback to improve your brushing technique. It could also track your brushing habits and provide personalized recommendations to improve your oral hygiene.

Toothbrush with Built-in Water Purification: Design a toothbrush with a built-in water purification system that can remove impurities and bacteria from the water you use to brush your teeth. This would provide clean and safe water for brushing, especially in areas where clean water is scarce.

Toothbrush with Customizable Bristles: Create a toothbrush with interchangeable bristles that can be customized to suit different brushing needs. For example, softer bristles for sensitive teeth and gums, or firmer bristles for more thorough cleaning.

Toothbrush with Integrated Toothpaste Dispenser: Design a toothbrush with an integrated toothpaste dispenser that releases the perfect amount of toothpaste for each brushing session. This would eliminate the need for separate toothpaste containers and make brushing easier and more convenient.

Toothbrush with Gaming Elements: Develop a toothbrush that incorporates gaming elements, such as points, badges, or leaderboards, to make brushing more fun and engaging for kids. The toothbrush could vibrate or light up when brushing is complete, providing a sense of accomplishment and motivation to brush regularly.
